questionlist.cardfront:
Under the shared responsibility model, which of the following is the customer responsible for?
A.Ensuring that disk drives are wiped after use.
B. Ensuring that firmware is updated on hardware devices.
C. Ensuring that data is encrypted at rest.
D.Ensuring that network cables are category six or higher.
questionlist.cardback: Ensuring data is encrypted at rest

questionlist.cardfront:
Which AWS feature allows companies to track and categorize spending on a detailed level?
A.Cost allocation tags
B.Consolidated billing
C.AWS Budgets
D.AWS Marketplace

Which service stores objects, provides real-time access to those objects, and offers versioning and lifecyclce capabilities?
A.Amazon Glacier
B.AWS Storage Gateway
C.Amazon S3
D.Amazon EBS

Which AWS team assists customers with accelerating cloud adoption through paid engagements?
A.AWS Enterprise Support
B.AWS Solutions Architects
C.AWS Professional Services
D.AWS Account Managers

A customer would like to design and build a new AWS workload but doesn't have in-house expertise. What program can the customer take advantage of?
A.AWS Partner Network Technology Partners
B.AWS Marketplace
C.AWS Partner Network Consulting Partners
D.AWS Service Catalog

Distributing workloads across multiple Availability Zones supports which architecture design principle?
A.Implement automation.
B.Design for agility.
C.Design for failure.
D.Implement elasticity.

Which AWS services can host a MSSQL database?
A.Amazon EC2
B.Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS)
C.Amazon Aurora
D.Amazon Redshift
E.Amazon S3

Which of the following inspects environments to find cost saving and performance enhancing opportunities?
A.AWS Cost Explorer
B.AWS Trusted Advisor
C.Consolidated billing
D.Detailed billing

Which of the following pricing models allow customers to use existing server-bound software licenses?
A.Spot Instances
B.Reserved Instances
C.Dedicated Hosts
D.On-Demand Instances

Which characteristics make AWS cost effective for a workload with dynamic user demand?
A.High availability
B.Shared security model
C.Elasticity
D.Pay-as-you-go pricing

Which service enables risk auditing by monitoring and logging account activity in the console and SDK's?
A.Amazon CloudWatch
B.AWS CloudTrail
C.AWS Config
D.AWS Health

Which of the following are characteristics of S3?
A.A global file system
B.An object store
C.A local file store
D.A network file system
E.A durable storage system

Which services can be used across hybrid cloud architectures?
A.Amazon Route 53
B.Virtual Private Gateway
C.Classic Load Balancer
D.Auto Scaling
E.Amazon CloudWatch default metrics

What costs are included when comparing AWS TCO with on-premise?
A.Project management
B.Antivirus software licensing
C.Data center security
D.Software development

A company is considering AWS for a self-hosted db that requires nightly shutdown. Which service should they use?
A.Amazon Redshift
B.Amazon DynamoDB
C.Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) with Amazon EC2 instance store
D.Amazon EC2 with Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS)

What is the correct relationship between regions, Availability Zones and edge locations?
A.Data centers contain regions.
B.Regions contain Availability Zones.
C.Availability Zones contain edge locations.
D.Edge locations contain regions.

Which AWS tool assists with estimating costs?
A.Detailed billing report
B.Cost allocation tags
C.AWS Simple Monthly Calculator
D.AWS Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) Calculator
E.Cost Estimator
questionlist.cardback: Cost allocation tags, Simple Monthly Calculator, TCO Calc

questionlist.cardfront:
Which of the following are advantages of consolidated billing?
A.The ability to receive one bill for multiple accounts
B.Service limits increasing by default in all accounts
C.A fixed discount on the monthly bill
D.Potential volume discounts, as usage in all accounts is combined
E.The automatic extension of the master account’s AWS support plan to all accounts
questionlist.cardback: Receive on bill for multiple accounts, potential volume disconts associated

questionlist.cardfront:
Which of the following Reserved instance pricing models provides the highest average savings compared with on-demand?
A.One-year, No Upfront, Standard RI pricing
B.One-year, All Upfront, Convertible RI pricing
C.Three-year, All Upfront, Standard RI pricing
D.Three-year, No Upfront, Convertible RI pricing
questionlist.cardback: Three-year, all upfront, standard RI pricing

questionlist.cardfront:
Compared with costs in traditional and virtualized datacenters, aws has:
A.greater variable costs and greater upfront costs.
B.fixed usage costs and lower upfront costs.
C.lower variable costs and greater upfront costs.
D.lower variable costs and lower upfront costs.

A characteristic of edge locations is that they:
A.host Amazon EC2 instances closer to users.
B.help lower latency and improve performance for users.
C.cache frequently changing data without reaching the origin server.
D.refresh data changes daily.
questionlist.cardback: cache frequently chaging data without reaching the origin server

questionlist.cardfront:
Which feature can limit S3 bucket access to specific users?
A.A public and private key-pair
B.Amazon Inspector
C.AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies
D.Security Groups

Which of the following security-related actions are available at no cost?
A.Calling AWS Support
B.Contacting AWS Professional Services to request a workshop
C.Accessing forums, blogs, and whitepapers
D.Attending AWS classes at a local university

Which of the RI pricing models can change the attributes of the RI as long as the exchange results in the creation of RIs of equal or greater value?
A.Dedicated RIs
B.Scheduled RIs
C.Convertible RIs
D.Standard RIs

Which AWS feature will reduce the customers tco?
A.Shared responsibility security model
B.Single tenancy
C.Elastic computing
D.Encryption

Which service will automatically scale with an expected increase in web traffic?
A.AWS CodePipeline
B.Elastic Load Balancing
C.Amazon EBS
D.AWS Direct Connect

Where are AWS compliance documance, such as an SOC 1 report, located?
A.Amazon Inspector
B.AWS CloudTrail
C.AWS Artifact
D.AWS Certificate Manager

Under the shared responsibility model, which are the customers responsibility?
A.Patching operating system components for Amazon Relational Database Server (Amazon RDS)
B.Encrypting data on the client-side
C.Training the data center staff
D.Configuring Network Access Control Lists (ACL)
E.Maintaining environmental controls within a data center
questionlist.cardback: Encrypting client-side data, configuring network access control lists

questionlist.cardfront:
Which is a recommended pattern for designing a highly available architecture on AWS?
A.Ensure that components have low-latency network connectivity.
B.Run enough Amazon EC2 instances to operate at peak load.
C.Ensure that the application is designed to accommodate failure of any single component.
D.Use a monolithic application that handles all operations.
questionlist.cardback: Ensure that the application is designed to accomodate failure of any single component

questionlist.cardfront:
According to best practices, how should an application be designed to run in AWS Cloud?
A.Use tightly coupled components.
B.Use loosely coupled components.
C.Use infrequently coupled components.
D.Use frequently coupled components.

AWS supports which of the following methods to add security to IAM users?
A.Implementing Amazon Rekognition
B.Using AWS Shield-protected resources
C.Blocking access with Security Groups
D.Using Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
E.Enforcing password strength and expiration
questionlist.cardback: Using multi-factor authentication (MFA); enforcing password strength and expiration

questionlist.cardfront:
Which AWS services should be used for read/write of constantly changing data?
A.Amazon Glacier
B.Amazon RDS
C.AWS Snowball
D.Amazon Redshift
E.Amazon EFS

What is one of the advantages of AWS RDS?
A.It simplifies relational database administration tasks.
B.It provides 99.99999999999% reliability and durability.
C.It automatically scales databases for loads.
D.It enabled users to dynamically adjust CPU and RAM resources.
questionlist.cardback: It simplifies relational database admin tasks

questionlist.cardfront:
A customer needs to run a MySQL database that easily scales. Which service should they use?
A.Amazon Aurora
B.Amazon Redshift
C.Amazon DynamoDB
D.Amazon ElastiCache

Which of the following components of the AWS global infrastructure consists of one or more discrete datacenters interconnected through low-latency links?
A.Availability Zone
B.Edge location
C.Region
D.Private networking
Which of the following is a shared control between the customer and AWS?
How many availability zones should compute resources be provisioned across to achieve HA?
One of the advantages to moving infrastructure from an on-premises data center to the AWS cloud is:
questionlist.cardback: it allows the business to focus on business activities

questionlist.cardfront: What is the lowest cost, durable storage option for retaining DB backups for immediate retrieval?
Which IAM feature allows developers to access AWS services through the AWS CLI?
Which of the following is a fast and reliable NoSQL db service?
What is an example of agility in the AWS Cloud?
questionlist.cardback: Decreased acquisition time for new compute resources

questionlist.cardfront: Which service should a customer use to consolidate and centrally manage multiple AWS accounts?
What approach to transcoding a large number of individual video files adheres to AWS architecture principles?
For which auditing process does AWS have sole responsibility?
Which feature of the Cloud will support an international company's requirement for low-latency to all of its customers?
A customers responsibility under the AWS shared responsibility model is:
A customer is using multiple AWS accounts with separate billing.  How can the customer take advantage of volume discounts with minimal impact to the AWS resources?
questionlist.cardback: Use consolidated billing feature in AWS Organizations

questionlist.cardfront: Which of the following are features of Amazon CloudWatch Logs?
Name the AWS DNS service
A customer needs to choose AWS Regions.  Which factors influence their decision?
Which storage service can be used as a low-cost option for hosting static websites?
Which Amazon EC2 instance pricing model can provide discounts of up to 90%?
What is the AWS customer responsible for according to the AWS shared responsibility model?
Which of the following AWS Cloud services can be used to run a customer-managed relational database?
Scalable data warehouse solution
Statement that best describes Elastic Load Balancing?
questionlist.cardback: It distributes incoming application traffic across one or more Amazon EC2 instances.

questionlist.cardfront: Two valid ways for a customer to interact with AWS services?
The AWS Cloud’s multiple Regions are an example of:
Which two AWS services can be used to serve large amounts of online video content with the lowest possible latency?
Which term describes this model: Web servers running on Amazon EC2 access a legacy application running in a corporate data center.
What is the benefit of using AWS managed services, such as Amazon ElastiCache and Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS)?
questionlist.cardback: They simplify patching and updating underlying OSs.

questionlist.cardfront: Which service provides a virtually unlimited amount of online highly durable object storage?
Which of the following Identity and Access Management (IAM) entities is associated with an access key ID and secret access key when using AWS Command Line Interface (AWS CLI)?
Which of the following security-related services does AWS offer? (Choose two.)
questionlist.cardback: Trusted Advisor security checks, data encryption

questionlist.cardfront: Which AWS managed service is used to host databases?
